pageTitle: Itinerary for Sunday, August 14, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Sunday, August 14, 2016:

Montréal, Quebec

12:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver brief remarks prior to the Montreal Pride Parade.

Canadian Center for Architecture, Garden
René-Lévesque Boulevard West, between Du Fort Street et Saint-Marc Street
Montréal, Quebec

Notes for media:

  • Media should arrive no later than 11:30 a.m.
  • Open coverage


1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the Montréal Pride Parade.

Notes for media :

  • Open coverage

PMO Media Relations:
media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
